This strain always helps with my nausea and headaches. Definitely feels more like medicine in my system rat...â€
â€œpretty good strain. easy to control how high you want to get. nice body buzz with a head high that's not too impairing.â€

â€œIs this the real life? Is this just fantasy? This is what you will be asking yourself when you pucker your lips for the first draw of Elmer's Glue. It is so smooth! Gentle on the lungs and a light taste that doesn't leave your mouth feeling like a bowl of cotton! 
My first hit had me focused on an area of pain in my back, but it went away after a few minutes. As far as head highs go, I think this is a relatively ligh...â€

â€œI have had a surgery recently and the healing process has caused nausea, high blood pressure and pain. This knock it right out. At the end of the high, I went right to sleep. It smells like pine...lol. Earthy tasting. Wish I took a picture. Great crystal on the buds and a beautiful green.â€
â€œIf you use a bong be prepared to only do 2 hits. This stuff is potent! I love it, less weed and the better I feel. Itâ€™s hard to type but my chronic pain flare up is gone, feel focused.â€

â€œDank. 22.6% thc I feel like should've tested higher. Very stoney, would recommend to another high tolerance smoker like myself.â€

For me, all of my worries went away, I felt as if there was no reason to feel anxious or sad anymore, I could think clearly and was coherent enough to interact with others, I wanted to get out and explore (and did not have a...â€

â€œThis left me super Stoney! Great addition to the GG family. Gave me a Mellow and relaxing effect for my whole body.â€

great for stomach problemsâ€

â€œBig beautiful colas that are bright green with some orange hues in there that you always should see in GG4, (one of the parent strains of Elmer's Glue) but The White genetics show up strong in this phenotype with a white dusting of trichromes covering the buds. It's very euphoric and I do not feel as sedated when The White is bred with an Indica. Definetly a great daytime strain for the seasoned smoker.â€

â€œI can honestly say that the GG strain is creating a very strong relaxing family line.
